meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6518.

div.div:
Ashok Poozhikunnel game 5.
Kristin Morgan game 1.

td.p: Brett Swartz, a graphic designer from Athens, Georgia
Kristin Morgan, a strategic analyst for NASA from Huntsville, Alabama
Ashok Poozhikunnel, an underwriter from Wheaton, Illinois (whose 4-day cash winnings total $69,002)

tr.td: COMPUTING
U.S. PLACE NAMES
TV NEWS
THANKS TO OUR "VET"s
ENTERTAINMENTS
SUPERSTARS OF SCIENCE
